page.title: 17Princess causes crisp crisis
page.content: We have foxes in our area so the {Belvoir Hunt}meets here at least twice a year, once at The King's Arms in Scalford and once at Goadby Marwood. The riders come from many miles around and eventually set off, after a drink,followed (on the roads)by people in cars who want to watch. {Prince Charles}often hunts with The Belvoir so people drive out from the town hoping to see him or{Princess {Diana}if she is following the Hunt. Perhaps Hunt following is hungry work.Princess Di once asked for a packet of{salt and vinegar crisps}in Scalford P.O. The shopkeeper, (who didn't look up from his work) told her they were{"Over there me duck!" } After she had left the shop there was a great demand for salt and vinegar crisps causing a temporary {local shortage. }
